Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: tuc62697
Reviews.Content: First I should mention that I purchased an upgraded version of this laptop - SSD instead of HDD and more RAM, although 4Gb is sufficient on its own.So, this is an awesome computer. The dual-tone carbon fiber body makes this thing ergonomic, durable as hell, and look sophisticated too. The trackpad and keyboard are well designed, the speakers are loud, clear, and well placed. The overall weight and size makes it easily portable. The matte screen is a big plus too. Overall I applaud the design for being both rugged and elegant at once; it really feels like high quality when you handle it. Powers up very quickly, as does waking from sleep. Battery life is very long (not as long as advertised, but battery life never measures up to as advertised anyway). Graphics are great, some light computer games played very well, never have problems with several heavy programs running.Overall great ultrabook. Great for students and professionals. (Only annoying thing is that the keyboard is not backlit.) The only better laptop imo seems to be the newest Zenbook, which is easily $300 more than this guy. P.S- if you're interested in getting this, customize it through Exotic PC. . . the price is unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: Very good laptop - reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Kapash
Reviews.Content: I have been using the laptop for nearly 2 months with no difficulty.  I added 4 GB of RAM and the unit is performing up to my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Macarrra
Reviews.Content: So far it has performed great, and is super portable and sleek as well as a decent battery life, would but another one if needed

Reviews.Title: ASUS B400A REVIEW
Reviews.Author: D8TGV
Reviews.Content: Thin, light, very good battery life, boots up in a few seconds. SSD is the way to go. Much better than a traditional laptop.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: DAE H KIM
Reviews.Content: I have been using this laptop around 1month, and it works very wellBooting speed is very fast, and other features are doing good

Reviews.Title: ASUS BU 400A Problems
Reviews.Author: James A Haddow
Reviews.Content: I received this unit and have had problems with it freezing up while on the internet and shutting itself down. I called ASUS and their response was to do a complete restore and loose all the software I downloaded already. They simply said sorry. I want to take it to one of their repair facilities and have them determine the problem but it does not appear they will do that. This will be the first and last ASUS I ever buy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5 3317U 1.7 GHz
4 GB DDR3
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
14.1-Inch Screen, Intel GMA HD
Windows 7 Professional
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS B400A-XH51 14.1-Inch Laptop (Black)
